definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

sentences.english: But this work is not just for our coordinators alone.
sentences.chinese: 但该项努力并不仅仅是我们的协调员们的工作。

sentences.english: Other jobs assigned by the corner sales manager or the sales coordinator.
sentences.chinese: 专卖店店长或者销售协调员分配的任务。

sentences.english: Mark Dybul is the U.S. Global AIDS Coordinator.
sentences.chinese: 戴布尔是美国全球艾滋病事务协调员。

sentences.english: The camp's chief coordinator Noor Shad oversees aid for nearly 2,000 individuals.
sentences.chinese: 营地首席协调员沙德负责监督将近两千人的援助工作。

sentences.english: Accomplish other tasks requested by School-linking Project Coordinator.
sentences.chinese: 完成学校联结项目协调员分配的其他工作。

sentences.english: The Emergency Coordinator is the only person with the authority to declare the all clear.
sentences.chinese: 只有紧急协调员才有权利宣布解除警报。

sentences.english: National Coordinators' Meeting on Criteria and Indicators for Sustainable Forest Management for Near East Countries.
sentences.chinese: 近东国家可持续森林管理标准及指标国家协调员会议。

sentences.english: The coordinators in each department will participate into these activities.
sentences.chinese: 相关司局的项目协调员参与区域专家组的活动。

sentences.english: so I help to manage the apartments in kind of, as an apartment coordinator.
sentences.chinese: 所以我就帮着管理公寓，当公寓协调员。

sentences.english: David Nabarro, senior coordinator for the U.N.'s avian flu task force, will serve as deputy.
sentences.chinese: 联合国禽流感高级协调员纳巴罗将任副组长。

sentences.english: The official explained to him that the “White House said no”.
sentences.chinese: 这位协调员向科纳森解释“白宫不让你去”。

sentences.english: OSC represents new generation of management software for service centers.
sentences.chinese: 现场协调员代表的新一代管理软件服务中心。
